ServerGroupHandler

public ServerGroupHandler()
Method Detail

listAdministrators

public java.util.List listAdministrators(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                                         java.lang.String systemGroupName)
Given a systemGroupName this call returns the list of users who can administer the group. One has to be a SystemGroupAdmin or an Org Admin to obtain this list..

Parameters:
sessionKey - The sessionKey containing the logged in user
systemGroupName - the name of the system group
Returns:
a list of users who can administer this system group.

addOrRemoveAdmins

public int addOrRemoveAdmins(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                             java.lang.String systemGroupName,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> loginNames,
                             boolean add)
Given a systemGroupName and a list of users this call adds or removes them as system administrators Note one needs to be an Org Admin to perform this operation..

Parameters:
sessionKey - The sessionKey containing the logged in user
systemGroupName - the name of the system group
loginNames - login names of users to be made admins..
add - a boolean to associate or dissociate admins from the group
Returns:
1 if the operation succeed 1 Exception other wise.

listSystems

public java.util.List listSystems(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                                  java.lang.String systemGroupName)
List the systems that are associated to the given system group.

Parameters:
sessionKey - The sessionKey containing the logged in user
systemGroupName - the name of the system group
Returns:
a list of systems associated to a given system group.

addOrRemoveSystems

public int addOrRemoveSystems(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                              java.lang.String systemGroupName,
                              java.util.List serverIds,
                              java.lang.Boolean add)
Associates a list of servers to a given group

Parameters:
sessionKey - The sessionKey containing the logged in user
systemGroupName - The name system group to whom you want to add servers
serverIds - a list of ids of the servers you wish to add to this group.
add - should this server be associated or dissociated to this group.
Returns:
Returns 1 if successful, exception otherwise

create

public ServerGroup create(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                          java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.String description)
Creates a new system group.. User needs to be a System Group Admin or an OrgAdmin to be able to create new system groups.

Parameters:
sessionKey - The sessionKey containing the logged in user
name - The name of the system group.. Note duplicates names cannot be created and will be responded to with an exception.
description - The description of a system group.
Returns:
the name of the system group created.

delete

public int delete(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                  java.lang.String systemGroupName)
Deletes a given system group - given the system group name

Parameters:
sessionKey - The sessionKey containing the logged in user
systemGroupName - the name of the system group
Returns:
1 for success exception other wise.

update

public ServerGroup update(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                          java.lang.String systemGroupName,
                          java.lang.String description)
Updates a system group. User needs to be a System Group Admin or an OrgAdmin to be able to create new system groups.

Parameters:
sessionKey - The sessionKey containing the logged in user
systemGroupName - The name of the system group that needs to updated..
description - The description of the system group.
Returns:
the updated system group.

listGroupsWithNoAssociatedAdmins

public java.util.List listGroupsWithNoAssociatedAdmins(java.lang.String sessionKey)
Returns a list of system groups that do not have a NON-OrgAdmin administrator.. Org admins implicitly have access to all system groups, so this call would not make sense for those cases.. Note the caller must be an orgadmin to get this information..

Parameters:
sessionKey - The sessionKey containing the logged in user
Returns:
List of ServerGroups that do not have an associated admin.

listAllGroups

public java.util.List<ManagedServerGroup> listAllGroups(java.lang.String sessionKey)
List all groups accessible by the logged in user

Parameters:
sessionKey - the sessionKey containing the logged in user
Returns:
a list of ServerGroup objects

                              java.lang.Integer systemGroupId)
                       throws FaultException
Parameters:

systemGroupId - Integer id of system group to look up

ServerGroup object

scheduleApplyErrataToActive

public int scheduleApplyErrataToActive(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                                       java.lang.String systemGroupName,
                                       java.util.List errataIds)
Schedules an action to apply errata updates to active systems from a group.

Parameters:
sessionKey - The user's session key.
systemGroupName - the system group
errataIds - List of errata IDs to apply (as Integers)
Returns:
1 if successful, exception thrown otherwise

scheduleApplyErrataToActive

public int scheduleApplyErrataToActive(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                                       java.lang.String systemGroupName,
                                       java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> errataIds,
                                       java.util.Date earliestOccurrence)
Schedules an action to apply errata updates to active systems from a group at a specified time.

Parameters:
sessionKey - The user's session key.
systemGroupName - the system group
errataIds - List of errata IDs to apply (as Integers)
earliestOccurrence - Earliest occurrence of the errata update
Returns:
1 if successful, exception thrown otherwise
